message: I've noticed that if you share a link to Convore on Facebook, that only userpics get pulled in as choices for the preview image. It would be nice if the logo got pulled in as well (and was the default in the preview--I don't know how you control that, though... does Facebook just default to the first image it finds?)
Yeah FB just defaults to the first image it finds
As soon as we add them, we can let FB know to pick that up
